title: 143:  DeShone Kizer, underclassmen QBs in NFL, Rams next head coach
itunes:title: 143:  DeShone Kizer, underclassmen QBs in NFL, Rams next head coach
description:
Former NFL scouts Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks discuss the Los Angeles Rams decision to fire Jeff Fisher and where the team will turn for its next head coach. The duo also break down Notre Dame quarterback DeShone Kizer's decision to declare for the NFL draft and how previous underclassmen QBs before him have done in the NFL.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
